definition: front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly
(classical) this, that/he, she, they/(exclamatory final particle)/(initial particle, introduces an opinion)

sentences.english: Seeing her former husband, she stood aside consciously.
sentences.chinese: 一看到她的前夫，她有意避开了。

sentences.english: She remarried her former husband ten years after their divorce.
sentences.chinese: 她与前夫离婚十年后又复婚了。

sentences.english: My own ex-spouse happens to think I changed my name too, and it breaks my heart.
sentences.chinese: 我的前夫正巧也认为我改了名，使我心碎。

sentences.english: Tears of love filled up her eyes when she saw her first husband down below.
sentences.chinese: 当她看到城墙下前夫的身影时，爱的热泪流满了眼帘。

sentences.english: Her former husband Clive paid tribute to a "wonderful" woman.
sentences.chinese: 她的前夫克里夫称赞她是一位美妙的女性。

sentences.english: The community college where my ex-husband teaches is next door to the North Carolina School for the Deaf.
sentences.chinese: 我前夫任教的社区大学紧邻北北卡罗来纳州聋人学校。

sentences.english: It turned out that the man in his home was his mother's ex- husband.
sentences.chinese: 最后证明，他家里的那个男人是他母亲的前夫。

sentences.english: Nicole Brown Simpson's ex-husband, former football great and media personality O.
sentences.chinese: 尼科尔布朗辛普森前夫前足球明星媒体著名人物O。
“这是我的前夫，他是日本人，”她说。

sentences.english: Her ex-husband seemed to be slipping away into one of his hopeless moods.
sentences.chinese: 她的前夫似乎又要陷入到某种绝望的情绪中去了。

sentences.english: When she awoke, Japan's next first lady wrote, she told her now ex-husband that she had just been to Venus.
sentences.chinese: 鸠山美由纪写到，醒来后她告诉前夫她刚刚去过金星。

sentences.english: Reem's father and ex-husband did not return CNN's calls.
sentences.chinese: 里姆的父亲和前夫没有回答CNN的电话。

definition: mistress/the other woman (coll.)/grade 3 in elementary school
to marry for the second time/second marriage/second spouse
